law.catch_line: Acquisitions of equipment or infrastructure by Soil and Water Conservation Commission.

text.section: The Soil and Water Conservation Commission as referred to in KRS Chapter 146, subject to the supervision of the commissioner for natural resources, to the restrictions provided in KRS 262.610 to 262.660, and to the requirements of KRS Chapters 42 and 45A, is hereby authorized to acquire and to make available, or to assist in acquiring or making available to soil and water conservation districts, heavy or specialized equipment or infrastructure which an individual district cannot itself economically obtain.
In giving effect to all of the foregoing, the commission shall estimate the amount of time such equipment would ordinarily be idle.

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 4, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 59, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 63. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 1.
